scenario_text.value: *huff* *huff* *puff*
Syakomon, you don’t look so good...
Syakomon, get back! This is too much!
No, I’m fine! I can keep fighting!
Sh-sheeelll...
Shellmon, you don’t look so good...
Shellmon, get back! This is too much!
It’s okay, I can still fight!
*huff* *huff*...!
Mermaimon, you don’t look so good...
Mermaimon, get back! This is too much!

Heheh, this is nothing! The party’s just
getting started!
Peep, peeep!
MarineAngemon, you don’t look so good...
MarineAngemon, get back! This is too much!

Peep pyu!
(I’m fine!)
Ngh... Still the enemy does not fall?
Azulongmon, you don’t look so good...
Azulongmon, get back! This is too much!

I am a defender of this world! I will not
fall back. Not while my partner stands firm.
But I don’t want to lose you...
Miu, we’ve almost got this!
Don’t forget, Jijimon is watching over you!
...Jijimon!

That’s right, Miu! You’re not just in this
for yourself!
You’ve got Jijimon’s wishes to honor as well!
That’s right! Everyone, not just Jijimon!
Everyone’s rooting for you, Miu!

That’s right, Miu. There’s a lot we need to
accomplish in this fight.

So we can’t afford to lose. Let’s make this
battle something Jijimon would be proud of!

Peepeep, peep pyu.
(Everyone wants you to come back, Miu.)

Peepeep pyu, peep pyu?
(Why don’t we bring Jijimon a souvenir?)

You are no longer just a visitor from another
world. There are those here who care for you.

Jijimon and many others are wishing for you
to triumph and return home.
Jijimon...

You’re right... We can’t just run. We need to
do this! For Jijimon, for all the others...
...and most importantly, for ourselves!
Right!
Let’s do this, Syakomon!
Leave it to me, Miu!
You said it!
Let’s do this, Shellmon!
Leave it to me, Miu!
That’s the spirit!
Let’s do this, Mermaimon!
You got it. Time to show what we’re made of!

Peep!
(Right!)
Let’s do this, MarineAngemon!

Peep pyuu!!!
(Leave it to me, Miu!!!)
...Precisely. It’s “us” now.
Let’s do this, Azulongmon!

As you wish, my partner, Miu! Witness my
power!!!
